headline: GRANVILLE PHILLIPS CONVECTRON GAUGE CONTROLLER
description: 316 Series Convectron Gauge Controller    Granville Phillips 316 Convectron Vacuum Gauge Controller allows you to measure pressure at three points in a vacuum system simultaneously.  The compact 3 1/2" high half-rack controller replaces up to three singe controllers, saving rack or bench space.
specstable:
Manufacturer Granville Phil
Model 316001
Description Convectron Gauge Controller
Gauge Types Controlled Convectron
Cables Included No
Accessories
  • Optional 6 channel process control board, can be added if available, +$450
Other Information

316015 module for Convectron gauge on Channel A
316016 module for Convectron gauges on Channel B and C
Can power and read from 3 convectron gauges
Gauge and cables are not included (inquire about availability)

Power Requirements 115 V
Exterior Dimensions
Width 9.250 in (23.5 cm)
Depth 11.000 in (27.9 cm)
Height 3.500 in (8.9 cm)
Weight 15 lb (7 kg)
